com.uce.userlab.haptics.HL
Class HLCache

java.lang.Object
  com.uce.userlab.haptics.HL.HLCache

public class HLCache
extends java.lang.Object

This Object is used to represent the cache of the parameters stored when the event is fired. This is because of the time delay of the event call and multi-threads that mean that parameters may change before callback is carried out, to solve this a cache is made of parameters values so they can be refered to by the callback method.
